```{r cars}
hsp70_avg=read.table(file="C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\check_structures\\hsp70\\results\\Average_4po2_Repair.fxout",header=T)
hsc70_avg=read.table(file="C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\check_structures\\hsc70\\results\\Average_hsc70_Repair.fxout",header=T)
dnak_avg=read.table(file="C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\check_structures\\dnak\\results\\Average_1dkz_Repair.fxout",header=T)
dnak_w1_avg=read.table(file="C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\check_structures\\dnak_w1\\results\\Average_4EZW1_Repair.fxout",header=T)

par(mfrow=c(3,6))
plot(hsp70_avg$Backbone_Hbond)
plot(hsp70_avg$Sidechain_Hbond)
plot(hsp70_avg$Van_der_Waals)
plot(hsp70_avg$Electrostatics)
plot(hsp70_avg$Solvation_Polar)
plot(hsp70_avg$Solvation_Hydrophobic)
plot(hsp70_avg$Van_der_Waals_clashes)
plot(hsp70_avg$entropy_sidechain)
plot(hsp70_avg$entropy_mainchain)
#plot(hsp70_avg$sloop_entropy)
#plot(hsp70_avg$mloop_entropy)
#plot(hsp70_avg$cis_bond)
plot(hsp70_avg$torsional_clash)
plot(hsp70_avg$backbone_clash)
plot(hsp70_avg$helix_dipole)
#plot(hsp70_avg$water_bridge)
#plot(hsp70_avg$disulfide)
plot(hsp70_avg$electrostatic_kon)
#plot(hsp70_avg$partial_covalent_bonds)
#plot(hsp70_avg$energy_Ionisation)
#plot(hsp70_avg$Entropy_Complex)

dataset_hs=rbind(hsp70_avg,hsc70_avg)
dataset_hs$Peptides=c("Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Alanine","NR","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Alanine","NR")
dataset_dna=rbind(dnak_avg,dnak_w1_avg)
dataset_dna$Peptides=c("Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Alanine","NR","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Best 20gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Worst 1gen","Alanine","NR")
```

```{r}
ggplot(dataset_dna, aes(x = Protein_peptide , y =Van_der_Waals,group = Peptides)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=Peptides))+
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(1,16.1), ylim=c(-9.5,0), clip="off") +
  geom_text(aes(4.5,-10,label = "DnaK", vjust = 1.9))+
  geom_text(aes(13,-10,label = "DnaK-W1", vjust = 1.9))+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),axis.title.x = element_blank(),axis.ticks.x = element_blank())+
  annotate("rect", xmin = 0.2, xmax = 8.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf,
           alpha = .1,fill = "blue")+
  ggtitle("Van der Waals Energy of DnaK and DnaK-W1 peptides")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))+
  labs(x = "Interacting Protein-Peptides",y="Van der Waals Energy (kcal)")+theme( axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = -1.4)
  )

#ggsave("vdw_dnak_dnakw1.png")
```

p=ggplot(dataset_hs, aes(x = Protein_peptide , y =Backbone_Hbond,group = Peptides)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=Peptides))+
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(1,16.1), ylim=c(min(dataset_hs$Backbone_Hbond),max(dataset_hs$Backbone_Hbond)), clip="off") +
  geom_text(aes(4.5,-14.75,label = "Hsp70", vjust = 1.9))+
  geom_text(aes(13,-14.75,label = "Hsc70", vjust = 1.9))+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),axis.title.x = element_blank(),axis.ticks = element_blank())+
  annotate("rect", xmin = 0.2, xmax = 8.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf,
           alpha = .1,fill = "blue")+
  ggtitle("Backbone H-Bond(kcal/mol)-Hsp70 & Hsc70 peptides")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.3))+
  labs(x="Hsp70                   Hsc70")+theme( axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = -1.4))
 # )

p + ylab(expression(atop("Backbone Hbond", paste("(kcal/mol)"))))

```

  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(1,16.1), ylim=c(min(dataset_hs$entropy_mainchain),max(dataset_hs$entropy_mainchain)), clip="off") +
  geom_text(aes(4.5,-14.75,label = "Hsp70", vjust = 1.9))+
  geom_text(aes(13,-14.75,label = "Hsc70", vjust = 1.9))+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),axis.title.x = element_blank(),axis.ticks = element_blank())+
  annotate("rect", xmin = 0.2, xmax = 8.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf,
           alpha = .1,fill = "blue")+
  ggtitle("Entropy Mainchain (kcal/mol)-Hsp70 & Hsc70 peptides")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.3))+
  labs(x="Hsp70                   Hsc70")+theme( axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = -1.4))
 # )

p + ylab(expression(atop("Entropy Mainchain", paste("(kcal/mol)"))))
```
